Published October 26 2014

Fighting fire with fire

Fighting fire with fire — Amazon: Introducing the Fire TV Stick. Prime Subscribers can get it for $19 (next two days only); otherwise, it will run $39 when it ships on November 19th. If we didn’t already stream through the PS4, I’d pick one of these up.

Enjoy your day.
